Name: Detective Hank and the Golden Sneeze
About the game: Become the self-proclaimed best detective in the world in “Detective Hank and the Golden Sneeze”, a steampunk themed, interactive whodunnit visual-novel with a different culprit on each playthrough! You play as Hank, tasked with finding the culprit who stole the Golden Sneeze. Features of the game High replay value; multiple people who could have stolen the Golden Sneeze. Multiple ways for the story to run Alternative paths for Detective Hank to take, all with different clues A total of 9 different endings, depending on your wits A steampunk world captured in cartoon art by Studio Enalya Atmosphere brought to life with a unique soundtrack by upcoming music talent Storytime Symphony Make your brain work in this puzzle adventure and solve the mystery of who stole the Golden Sneeze!
